definitions.definition: To shine tremulously or intermittently ; to gleam faintly .
Of a mass of bees : to move their abdomens in a coordinated manner so as to produce a shimmering wave effect, thought to deter predators .

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To shine tremulously or intermittently ; to gleam faintly .
secondary_definitions: Of a mass of bees : to move their abdomens in a coordinated manner so as to produce a shimmering wave effect, thought to deter predators .
